name: Forest Below
description:
Forest Below is a turn based token puzzler with intense tree growing action.
Teach the roots of the forest to grow so the fairies of the land have a home to come back to.
Make your way from world to world repopulating the forests and see your fairy family flock to you.
Strengthen the roots to burrow past where they couldn't before, avoid decay and ravenous moles, and gather water to reach each tier of growth.
